---
title: iDeviceHandle Equality operator
---

Determines whether two specified instances of [`iDeviceHandle`](../iDeviceHandle.md) are equal.

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(iDeviceHandle value1, iDeviceHandle value2)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value1 | The first pointer or handle to compare. |
| value2 | The second pointer or handle to compare. |

## Return Value

`true` if *value1* equals *value2*; otherwise, `false`.
